casebody.data:
LEARY
v.
N.C. FOREST PRODUCTS, et al. No. 277A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 22, 2003. Tommy W. Jarrett, Goldsboro, for Canal Wood Corporation. Moses D. Lasitter, New Bern, for Forest Prod., Wetherington et al. Motion by Defendants (Mamie Leary, T. Barbara Leary, Mamie Ruth Leary Claggett, Elmer Lee Lear, Sr., Pattie Leary, Linwood Leary, Sandra Leary Grissom, Laura M. Leary Elliott, Allen R. Elliott, Shirley Leary Staten, Harold J.R. Leary, Richard Smith, Elmer Lee Leary, Jr. Patrick R. Leary, Kenneth Leary, and Arlene P. Smith) for Extension of Time to File Brief has been filed and the following order entered:

"Motion Allowed. Defendants (Barbara Leary, et al.) shall have up to and including the 12th day of September 2003 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of August 2003."
